industry_analysis.cost_trend: Increasing due to advanced packaging (CoWoS) scarcity and 3nm/4N wafer costs. TSMC price hikes projected through 2025.
industry_analysis.main_cost_driver: Advanced packaging (CoWoS) capacity constraints (60-70% of non-silicon cost)

last_updated: October 2023 (Projections for 2024-2025 based on Q3 2023 industry reports)
data_notes: All figures are analyst estimates (TechInsights, TrendForce, SemiAnalysis). Actual costs are trade secrets.
H100/MI300X pricing reflects enterprise/datacenter solutions, not consumer retail.
Gross margins include amortized R&D but exclude software ecosystem value.
TSMC CoWoS packaging capacity shortage (2023-2024) is a major cost/supply factor.
R&D allocation per unit based on projected sales volumes over product lifecycle.
Intel Arc consumer GPU cost data insufficient for reliable 2024-2025 datacenter comparison.
